page.title: 10Sporting Activities
page.content: People feel that more can be done to provide facilities, especially a swimming pool & sports centre. The Community Centre does not provide adequate compensation. Many activities take place in the area but financing can cause problems. Some activities are financed by enthusiasts or sponsors but sometimes grants are available. Traditional activities still flourish. Football and cricket are popular, many pubs and organisations having their own Sunday football team. Cricket has its own annual competition. Many boys carry on playing the sports they learned at school. Tennis and golf are played and the scenic walk in the area are used by horse riders as well as walkers and cyclists. BMX cycling is popular. .
